content: turn granny heart squares into a bold scarf this pattern includes video tutorials to guide you through crocheting the granny heart and backing it with a granny square use planned colors or make your version scrappy makes a great gift for valentine s or galentine s day birthdays mother s day and more this was originally published in 3 parts as the seventeenth pattern in the weekend mystery crochet along with underground crafter 1 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 2 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch treble_crochet crocheting in the round increasing crocheting in chain spaces joining with slip_stitch seam includes video tutorial special stitch pattern decrease includes written instruction and video tutorial in pattern **skill level** easy **materials** big twist value 3 yarn 100% acrylic 6 oz/170 g 380 yd/347 m 1 skein each in ivory mc magenta ca and medium rose cb *or approximately 315 yd 288 m in mc and 165 yd 151 m in ca and cb in any medium weight yarn* us size j-10/6 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge * yarn needle **gauge** rnds 1-3 in pattern = 3 5 9 cm from point to center of bumps through round 6 in pattern = 5 13 cm square through round 8 in pattern = 7 17 5 cm square *exact gauge is not critical for this project * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2022/01/28/weekend-mystery-crochet-alongs/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/01/03/weekend-mystery-cal-17/ 3 https //prf hn/l/vxgmwlk
